findings.title: Missing Events For Critical Arithmetic Parameters
findings.description: The missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain changes in the uuid. An event should be emitted for significant transactions calling the setMintCounter function.

findings.title: Redundant variables
findings.description: The variables 'BytesLib.concatStorage(bytes,bytes).mc_concatStorage_asm_0' and 'BytesLib.concatStorage(bytes,bytes).sc_concatStorage_asm_0' are potentially used before declaration.

findings.title: Missing Range Check for Input Variables
findings.description: The role can set the txFee variable arbitrarily large or small, causing potential risks in fees and anti whale.

findings.title: Unchecked complex calculations throughout the contract
findings.description: Performing calculations without checking the outputs can lead to severe errors due to potential overflows or underflows.
